attributes.action: No Government of the UK to make it law that we spend at  least 0.7% of GDP on Overseas Aid.
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned object in the strongest terms that any Government of the UK would set in law that we spend at least £12 Billion pound or 0.7% of GDP in overseas aid.  We would not support any Government that decided to spend this amount of money in overseas aid and we urge the Government and all political parties to reject this Private Members Bill, in the National interest of the British economy.
